lead_paragraph: Clay-court specialist Nicolas Almagro defeated second-seeded Nick Kyrgios 6-3, 7-5 at the Estoril Open on Saturday to reach his second final of the season.

headline.print_headline: Almagro Faces Carreno Busta in Estoril Open Final
headline.main: Almagro Faces Carreno Busta in Estoril Open Final

snippet: Clay-court specialist Nicolas Almagro defeated second-seeded Nick Kyrgios 6-3, 7-5 at the Estoril Open on Saturday to reach his second final of the season....
